sentences.en: Article 10 provides that all businesses must be registered correctly.
sentences.cn: 第十款规定所有的企业必须正确地登记注冊.

sentences.en: Did I pronounce your name correctly?
Have I pronounced your name correctly?
He behaved correctly, according to his lights.
sentences.cn: 他按自己的见解正确行事.

sentences.en: He can pronounce this word correctly.
I couldn't get the graphics to print correctly.
sentences.cn: 我无法将图表正确地打印出来.

sentences.en: If you can use a word correctly and effectively, you comprehend it.
sentences.cn: 你如果能正确和有效地使用一个字，你就了解它了。

sentences.en: It is important to judge the weight of your washing load correctly.
sentences.cn: 正确估计待洗衣物的重量很重要。

sentences.en: My own mother was brought up very strictly and correctly.
sentences.cn: 我母亲从小接受严格而规范的教育。

sentences.en: Nathan's new running shoes weren't broken in correctly.
sentences.cn: 内森的新跑鞋不太合脚。

sentences.en: Please check that your surname and forenames have been correctly entered.
sentences.cn: 请核对你的姓名已正确输入。

sentences.en: The views of each side are correctly understood by the other.
The writer expresses himself correctly in English.
sentences.cn: 作家用英语正确地表达自己的意思。

sentences.en: Very few people can pronounce my name correctly.
sentences.cn: 很少有人能把我的名字念正确。

sentences.en: We have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.
sentences.cn: 我们尚未学会正确使用标点符号.

sentences.en: When an accident happens, quite correctly questions are asked.
sentences.cn: 当事故发生时，理所当然要询问一些情况。

words.tran_cn: 纠正；改正（correct的过去分词）；制止

trans.tran_cn: 正确地，得体地，实事求是
